title: ollama/ollama
summary: The official Ollama CLI and server that lets you run Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally with a single command.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull, list, copy, delete models via Python.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers; same generate/chat/embed API surface as the Python SDK.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package exposing Ollama models as LLM and embeddings components.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich ChatGPT-style web UI for Ollama; model management, multi-user, RAG, open-source.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/JVM client for Ollama; sync/async APIs, Kotlin extensions, Spring Boot starter.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem for Ollama; simple generate/chat interface, streaming support.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Enhanced interactive CLI for Ollama written in Go; history, syntax highlighting, fuzzy model search.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that brings local Ollama models into the editor as GitHub Copilot replacement.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-camunda
summary: Camunda 8 connector that invokes Ollama models inside BPMN processes for AI tasks.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selection.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official Docker images (CPU & GPU) for Ollama server with one-line run instructions.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma + LangChain to chat with local PDFs.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that lets servers chat with local Ollama models using slash commands.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app that adds /ollama slash command to query local models from any channel.

title: ollama-nim
summary: Nim client library for Ollama; idiomatic API, async support, compile-time model types.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Official Rust crate providing typed async client for Ollama using reqwest.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that wraps Ollama for CI/CD pipelines; spin up model containers on demand.

title: ollama-rag-qa
summary: Streamlit app for question-answering over private documents using Ollama embeddings and LlamaIndex.
